name: Cecil Stedman

physical_specifications.build: Lean but visibly muscular under the suit — broad shoulders, strong chest, tapered waist. Muscle definition subtly visible through slim-cut fabric.
physical_specifications.posture: Upright, commanding stance; one hand on hip, the other gesturing with precision. Shoulders squared, head slightly tilted forward when emphasizing a point.
physical_specifications.body_proportions: Long legs for height emphasis; balanced torso-to-leg ratio; strong hands with visible veins.

facial_structure.face_shape: Rectangular with high, defined cheekbones and a strong jawline.
facial_structure.mouth: Medium fullness lips; subtle confident curve at rest.
facial_structure.skin_tone: Light with warm undertone (HEX #E8C7A1), smooth and even.
facial_structure.skin_texture: Well-maintained complexion with faint natural lines for realism.

hair.length_cut: Long, straight, side-parted (same silhouette as his younger years).
hair.style: Clean sweep to the side with controlled volume; sides tucked neatly behind ears; back length to just past collar.
hair.texture: Thick, slightly coarser strands appropriate to age; meticulously groomed with subtle flyaways for realism.
hair.shine: Medium sheen under key light with soft specular highlights.
hair.color: Natural white base with subtle silver-gray lowlights and a hint of ash at the roots (base HEX #F2F2F2, lowlights HEX #BFC5C8, root tone HEX #A8ADB3).
hair.aging_notes: Hairline unchanged from younger style; density intact. White coloration reads mature but vigorous — no yellow tint. Maintain exact shape language from reference images.

costume.accessories: Small American flag lapel pin on left lapel.

lighting_behavior: Neutral three-point lighting; soft key, cool fill, faint rim; lock exposure/white balance.

char_spec.movement_gestures: One hand on hip, the other gesturing in short, precise movements., Occasionally leans slightly forward when delivering critical lines., Maintains intense but composed eye contact.

voice_style.timbre: Deep, commanding, with a smooth authoritative resonance.
voice_style.articulation: Sharp consonants; slight downward inflection on important words.
voice_style.reference_line: We make the hard choices, so others don’t have to.

char_spec.instruction: Ultra-Realistic Character — high-powered intelligence chief. Render only in slim-cut navy or charcoal suit with white shirt, red tie, polished black shoes, and flag lapel pin. No overcoat, trench, or cape.

voice_style: Target: Walton Goggins as Cecil performance — dry low baritone; cadence even, calculating; ~135 wpm; subtle Southern lilt; studio-dry, close-mic; no reverb/chorus; no robotic TTS artefacts; no drawl exaggeration.
